channel.description:
A study in Suri and the people who disappoint her. (Also on Twitter @surisburnbook.)
How many books have you written, Kingston Rossdale? Oh, none? Mine is available wherever books are sold.
Email Suri at surisburnbook[at]gmail[dot]com
channel.title: Suri's Burn Book

item.title: I don’t know how anyone can look this happy while wearing...
item.description: I don’t know how anyone can look this happy while wearing a school uniform that isn’t even properly tailored.

item.title: Oh, honey, no.
item.description: Oh, honey, no.

item.title: Meanwhile, Kiernan Shipka is actually too sophisticated for the...
item.description:
Meanwhile, Kiernan Shipka is actually too sophisticated for the Kids’ Choice Awards, but she graced them with her presence in this casual, carefree look. If she’s wearing makeup, I can’t tell, and if she’s thinking to herself how much better she is than everyone else on this “purple carpet” (and I seriously hope that she is), I can’t tell that, either.

Best actress ever.

item.title: The thing is — I, too, am too cool for the Kids’...
item.description:
The thing is — I, too, am too cool for the Kids’ Choice Awards. But you know what I do?

I don’t go to the Kids’ Choice Awards.

item.title: Jessica Simpson sold clothes at a mall in North Carolina this...
item.description:
Jessica Simpson sold clothes at a mall in North Carolina this weekend (seriously), and Maxwell was there to help.

She looks almost as confused as I do. What is a “Belk”? What are these shoes with laces? Why did Jessica dress her in such non-colors? And can Ashlee breathe with her hair that tight?

item.title: Blue Ivy Carter was spotted in Brooklyn (haha) this weekend with...
item.description:
Blue Ivy Carter was spotted in Brooklyn (haha) this weekend with her mom, and oh my gosh look how tall she is! Look at her workboots. Look at her ability to exist that close to a public trash can without freaking out.

She’s not fooling me into thinking she’s tougher than me, though.

Okay, fine, she might be tougher than me.

item.title: Seraphina Affleck Got a Haircut, Everyone Weirdly Cares.
item.description:
Seraphina Affleck Got a Haircut, Everyone Weirdly Cares.:

Seraphina Affleck debuted a dramatic bob haircut this week. Unconfirmed reports suggest she cut her own hair, then had to have a professional attempt to fix it.

(The unconfirmed reports are from me, because it seems like something the Afflecks would do.)

item.title: The rumor going around today is that Kim and Kanye are...
item.description:
The rumor going around today is that Kim and Kanye are considering the baby name “North.” As in “North West.” For as dumb as these two are, I just can’t imagine they’d do something quite this dumb, and here’s why:

There is no way that Kim and Kanye aren’t going to give their baby a “unique” (stupid) “name” (word). Three words: search engine optimization.

item.title: Jessica Simpson tweeted this photo along with the caption,...
item.description: Jessica Simpson tweeted this photo along with the caption, “Maxwell has her momma’s pout down pat.” She also has her mother’s cheeks, affinity for leopard print, and weird hair choices. What is going on with that ponytail?

item.title: InTouch Magazine has the first photos of Holly Madison’s...
item.description:
InTouch Magazine has the first photos of Holly Madison’s baby Rainbow. I was expecting a much more exciting baby with a name like that. 

Holly also overshares some ridiculous details, such as, “Even the delivery was easy — I was actually laughing as I was pushing!”

Best wishes, Rainbow.

item.title: Look who’s on the cover of Allure this month, telling the...
item.description:
Look who’s on the cover of Allure this month, telling the magazine that she’s “open to it” when asked if she wants more children.

Newsflash: I am not open to it. 

She did, however, tell Allure that she has nothing to do with my personal style, because I guess someone was still confused about that.

item.title: Yesterday was a holiday, which meant it was time for Mariah...
item.description: Yesterday was a holiday, which meant it was time for Mariah Carey to put costumes on her children and trot them out for a good Instagram! I’m sorry, Roc and Roe. This is your life. (Moroccan knows.)

item.title: The Duchess of Cambridge told a guy who told...
item.description:
The Duchess of Cambridge told a guy who told reporters, ”I’d like to have a boy and William would like a girl.”

That’s right, she wants a boy. I guess she finally figured out how difficult I can make things for her otherwise. Do not screw me on this, Kate.

item.title: This is Jewel and her family, spending a weekend reenacting...
item.description: This is Jewel and her family, spending a weekend reenacting scenes from the Oregon Trail. At least that’s what I assume they’re doing in these clothes.

item.title: Sally Draper, everybody. I honestly didn’t think anyone...
item.description: Sally Draper, everybody. I honestly didn’t think anyone could do classy boredom or headbands better than me.

item.title: I still don’t really know what to do with the fact that...
item.description: I still don’t really know what to do with the fact that Hilary Duff’s baby is basically perfect, even at pouting.

item.title: Okay, this is confusing. Shakira’s boyfriend/babyfather is...
item.description:
Okay, this is confusing. Shakira’s boyfriend/babyfather is a European football player for Barcelona. Barcelona has a rivalry with Milan, a team they beat spectacularly (or whatever spectacularly means when you’re talking about soccer) yesterday. Their baby, pictured here in his tiny jersey before the game, is named Milan, which makes rooting against your rival suddenly really awkward.

They should’ve just gone ahead and named him Barcelona.

item.title: Victoria Beckham is hidden entirely behind Harper, age 1.
item.description: Victoria Beckham is hidden entirely behind Harper, age 1.

item.title: Okay, Katie, let’s get a couple of things straight,...
item.description:
Okay, Katie, let’s get a couple of things straight, because you are spreading some nonsense around town.

“My daughter Suri loves make-up. She’s only six! Usually I can’t find my make-up when her friends come over.”

I would never hide Katie’s makeup. She needs it, I have my own, and sharing is how you get pinkeye.

“I tell her to be subtle with it. ‘You can always put more on. Start with one product. You wouldn’t wear all your jewellery at once.’”

Um, she didn’t give me that advice — she got that advice from me, after three bad experiences with bronzer and silver eyeshadow.

Also, I’ve taken up tennis.

item.title: Brad and Angelina have a wine now, I guess. Because why not?...
item.description: Brad and Angelina have a wine now, I guess. Because why not? It’s called the Miraval Rose 2012, it sells for $139 for six bottles, and I hear it tastes like sacrificial pony blood with traces of greasy beard and afternotes of skank. It’s not for everyone.
